courses.name: Identity & Access Management - Learn LDAP, SAML, OAuth, OpenID
courses.description: Identity management, also known as identity and access management, is a framework of policies and technologies for ensuring that the proper people in an enterprise have the appropriate access to technology resources.
topics: What is identity and access management?
What is SSO and How it Works?
What is SAML and How it Works?
What is OAuth and How it Works?
What is LDAP and How it Works?

courses.name: Git & GitHub For Beginners - Master Git and GitHub (2025)
courses.description: Master React with comprehensive coverage of hooks, context API, routing, and state management patterns for building modern web applications.
topics: Version Control Premium Content: Visualization, Flow, and Commands
Branching - Full Introduction to merging [Branches in Version Control]
Merging - Process, Steps, and Merger Techniques

courses.name: Software Architecture & Design of Modern Large Scale Systems
courses.description: Become a Software Architect or Technical Lead by Mastering Software Architecture, System Design & Big Data Processing.
